snippet: The Internal Revenue Service says information provided by Bradley C. Birkenfeld, a former banker at UBS, was so helpful that he would receive a $104 million whistle-blower award for revealing the secrets of the Swiss banking system.
abstract: The Internal Revenue Service says information provided by Bradley C. Birkenfeld, a former banker at UBS, was so helpful that he would receive a $104 million whistle-blower award for revealing the secrets of the Swiss banking system.
